text: Marc Bernhard (born 5 February 1972) is a German politician for the populist Alternative for Germany (AfD)and since 2017 member of the Bundestag, the federal legislative body. ==Life and politics== Bernhard was born 1972 in the west German town of Reutlingen and studied jurisprudence at the University of Augsburg and became lawyer. Bernhard was member of the centre-right Christian Democratic Union of Germany before he entered the newly founded AfD in 2013. Since 2017 he is member of the Bundestag. Bernhard denies the scientific consensus on climate change. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1972 births Category:21st-century German politicians Category:Christian Democratic Union of Germany politicians Category:Alternative for Germany politicians Category:University of Augsburg alumni Category:Jurists from Baden-Württemberg Category:People from Reutlingen Category:Members of the Bundestag 2017–2021 Category:Members of the Bundestag for the Alternative for Germany
title: Marc Bernhard
